availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: K. N. Harris (Catlettsburg, Boyd County, Kentucky resident)

body.p: Catlettsburg, Boyd County, Kentucky merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Louisa Harris. Father of Robert P. Harris, Eleanor M. Harris, Martila E. Harris, Nancy J. Harris, Albert G. Harris, Charles C. Harris, Henry L. Harris, and Winfield S. Harris. Merchant in Catlettsburg, Boyd County, Kentucky in 1850. Owned three enslaved individuals in Johnson County, Kentucky in 1850. Owned one enslaved individual in Catlettsburg in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, p. 80A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Johnson County, p. 1.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boyd County, Catlettsburg, p. 806.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Boyd County, Catlettsburg, p. 1.
